definition: small piece of e.g. bread or cake, to remove crumbs from
details:
noun
- small piece of e.g. bread or cake
- a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible
= synonyms: stinkpot
- a very small quantity of something
= example: a very small quantity of something
verb
- to remove crumbs from
= example: to remove crumbs from
- to break into crumbs
- to coat with bread crumbs
= example: to coat with bread crumbs
